entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
